description.en:
"SingularDTV is laying the foundation for a decentralized entertainment industry. On September 2019, SingularDTV announced the first Censorship Resistant Media DAO: The SNGLS DAO. The SNGLS DAO will provide the non-profit governance layer for the SNGLS Media Distribution Protocol. Established by SingularDTV as an independent and objective organization to guide the development of the protocol, the prime directive of the SNGLS DAO
is to uphold the tenets of decentralization and build a truly decentralized, community-owned, self-adaptive media distribution protocol."

ico_data.short_desc: Blockchain film and television studio & distribution portal
ico_data.description: SingularDTV's (S-DTV) mission is the creation of informative, enlightening and inspiring media for the thinkers of the global pop. It is a blockchain and Ethereum-based production and distribution platform: creating high-quality, original film and television content, initially focused on documentaries and the science fiction genre.
